topics.body:
Kind of old news, but it's going to rustle everyone's jimmies; apparently windows with their operating systems may be moving to monthly subscription services.

How would you react if windows 9 required a monthly subscription service?  How much would you be willing to pay a month for the operating system?  What is your reaction to this?



My reaction:
[spoiler]
!http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/296/349/ae2.gif!
Linux master race ftw[/spoiler]
